articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives IOC President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives IOC President
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received Thomas Bach, president of the International Olympic Committee (IOC), and his party on a visit to the DPRK.
					Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un met the IOC president and had a souvenir photo taken with him.
					
					He warmly welcomed the IOC president's visit to the DPRK and had a talk with him in a warm and friendly atmosphere.
					
					The IOC president said the purpose of their visit to Pyongyang is to express the most heartfelt thanks to respected Chairman Kim Jong Un of the State Affairs Commission for his contribution to making the 23rd Winter Olympics successful ones symbolic of peace.
					
					At the Olympics the teams of the north and the south jointly entered the venue of the opening ceremony in the Olympic ideal, competed in games as a single team for the first time in the history of Olympics and thus showed the whole world their will to achieve peace and reconciliation and made the Olympics the ones which evoked the greatest emotion, the president said.
					
					He expressed his will to make sure that the IOC would cooperate with the DPRK in the long-term preparation for its participation in the 2020 Tokyo Olympics and the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics and greatly contribute to the development of sports in the DPRK by proactively using the international sports arena including the Olympic forum with his Pyongyang visit as a momentum. 
					
					The Supreme Leader thanked him for it and said that he was very thankful that the IOC paid special attention to the DPRK players' participation in the 23rd Winter Olympics and made active cooperation while taking special measures beyond rules and precedents.
					
					Noting the Winter Olympics were not only successful ones as Olympics but also ones of special significance which opened a new chapter of concord between the north and the south, he said that the once frozen north-south relations greeted a dramatic thawing season with the Olympics as a momentum and it was totally attributable to the efforts of the IOC which offered an opportunity and paved a path for it.
					
					Expressing deep thanks to the IOC for having sincerely cooperated with the DPRK, regardless of any political climate and conditions, he hoped that the positive and proactive cooperative relations between the DPRK Olympic Committee and the IOC would as ever favorably develop.
					
					Explaining the IOC president about the sports policy of the DPRK and its prospect, he said he expects close contact and excellent cooperation with the IOC in further developing and improving various sports events including winter sports events in line with the world trend.
					
					He warmly invited the IOC president to frequently visit the DPRK as a friend.
					
					Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Choe Hwi, chairman of the National Sports Guidance Committee and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Kim Il Guk, chairman of the DPRK Olympic Committee and minister of Physical Culture and Sports, and other cadres.
					
					That day the Supreme Leader, together with the IOC president and his party, enjoyed a football match between the State Women's Football Team and the Women's Football Team of the Pyongyang Sports Team.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from IOC
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from IOC
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the International Olympic Committee (IOC).

articles.title: Seed-Processing Agent "Kirim 2"
articles.content:
Seed-Processing Agent "Kirim 2"
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- New seed-processing agent "Kirim 2" is well received by the agricultural sector of the DPRK for raising the germination rate of seeds in low temperature, preventing seedlings from getting various diseases even in basic soil and improving their early nutritive conditions.
					 As it has strong penetration and bacteriostasis against pathogenic fungi, it has good effects of bringing earlier the germination of seeds and building up the resistance of seedlings on nursery bed to damage by diseases and insects.
					
					 It also helps young crops overcome damages by frost, drought and over moisture.
					
					 It was proved highly effective through trials taken at greenhouses of the Jangchon Vegetable Cooperative Farm in Sadong District, Pyongyang in the middle of February.
					
					 Now, the farm has made preparations for introducing the agent into processing vegetable and rice seeds.
					
					 True to the intention of the Workers' Party of Korea on applying agricultural sci-tech achievements to production, the introduction of the agent gains momentum in many farms across the country, including Hwasan Cooperative Farm in Sinchon County, South Hwanghae Province, Yanggok Cooperative Farm in Ryonggang County and Songhyon Cooperative Farm in Onchon County, Nampho City and Tongsam Cooperative Farm in Unjon County, North Phyongan Province.

articles.title: U.S. Anti-DPRK Human Rights Racket Denounced
articles.content:
U.S. Anti-DPRK Human Rights Racket Denounced 
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- An article of Rodong Sinmun on Saturday denounces the U.S. and its vassal forces for spreading false story about "human rights situation" in the DPRK while getting keen on the racket for putting sanctions on it.
					 Their anti-DPRK "human rights" racket is an intolerable act of hostility tarnishing the prestige of the dignified DPRK and denying its ideology and social system, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is the DPRK in which the genuine sovereign rights of the popular masses are guaranteed by law under the state protection and which develops by the creative enthusiasm and devoted efforts made by them.
					
					 Nowhere can there be found a country which has become a great garden in which respect for the people and loving care for them are becoming a reality.
					
					 There can never exist "human rights issue" in the DPRK, socialist system centered on the popular masses.
					
					 The "human rights" issue which the U.S. gets vocal while faulting the DPRK is groundless as the U.S. cooked it up by egging despicable human scum on to it.
					
					 The U.S. anti-DPRK "human rights" racket is an anachronistic one aimed to justify its hostile policy toward the DPRK and undermine the single-minded unity of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is finding find fault with the "human rights" issue in the DPRK. This is like pointing an accusing finger at others' door through a torn hole on its own door.
					
					 The U.S. had better mind its own business before groundlessly taking issue with others.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Vows to Take Lead in Abolishing Evils
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Vows to Take Lead in Abolishing Evils
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of All-People Action to Punish Lee Myung Bak-Park Geun Hye in south Korea issued a statement appealing to turn out in the actions to abolish evils, according to the Voice of Seoul, south Korean internet newspaper, on March 28.
					 The statement vowed to wipe out those evil forces when they deceive the people and bring insult to them.
					
					 The conservative forces are a group of ogres who neither admit nor repent of their act of wining and dining before the bereaved families of the ferry Sewol disaster holding a hunger strike, it noted.
					
					 It said that the organization would take the lead in an unflinching action until the evils are completely abolished.

articles.title: Former S. Korean Defense Minister Referred to Court
articles.content:
Former S. Korean Defense Minister Referred to Court 
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Traitor Kim Kwan Jin, former Defense Minister of south Korea, on March 28 was referred to the court on charges of illegal intervention in the 2012 "presidential" election and "National Assembly" election by directly leading the army cyber command to build up opinion in favor of the conservative group, according to the south Korean CBS.
					 Im Kwan Bin, former policy section chief of Defense Ministry, and Kim Thae Hyo, former foreign strategy planning chief of Chongwadae Secretariat, were also reported to have been referred to court on the same charges.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Germany
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Germany
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, was formed by the German Communist Party on March 21.
					 Torsten Schoevitz, chairman of the German Communist Party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from March 21 to April 15 and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of the President in the period.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Thailand
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Thailand
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A Thai preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, was formed on March 21.
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events including celebration meeting, seminar and film show on the occasion of the 106th birth anniversary of the President.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe a Thomas Bach y su comitiva
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe a Thomas Bach y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recibio al presidente del Comite Olimpico Internacional, Thomas Bach, y su comitiva que estan de visita en Corea.
					El Maximo Dirigente tomo una foto de recuerdo con el visitante.
					
					Luego de darle calida bienvenida, converso con el en un ambiente cordial y amistoso.
					
					En la ocasion, Thomas Bach dijo que el y sus acompanantes vinieron a Pyongyang para expresar el agradecimiento mas sincero al estimado Presidente del Comite de Estado Kim Jong Un quien hizo aporte a la celebracion exitosa de los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales como cita deportiva de la paz.
					
					De acuerdo con el ideal olimpico, las selecciones del Norte y el Sur de Corea hicieron aparicion conjunta en el estadio de los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales y compitieron formando el equipo unico por primera vez en la historia olimpica, expreso el visitante y prosiguio que asi mostraron a todo el mundo la voluntad de paz y reconciliacion de ambas partes coreanas y convirtieron en la mas emocionante esa cita deportiva.
					
					Aprovechando esta visita, expuso la voluntad del COI de cooperar a largo plazo en los preparativos de la RPDC para los Juegos Olimpicos de Tokio de 2020 y los Juegos Olimpicos Invernales de Beijing de 2022 y de contribuir en todo lo posible al desarrollo deportivo de Corea utilizando activamente el foro olimpico y otros escenarios deportivos internacionales.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente le dio las gracias por el respecto y dijo que esta muy agradecido de que el COI haya prestado la atencion especial a la participacion de los jugadores coreanos en los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales y cooperado con entusiasmo tomando las medidas excepcionales por encima de las reglas y costumbres.
					
					Los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales resultaron un exito olimpico y revistieron tambien un significado especial escribiendo la nueva pagina de armonia entre el Norte y el Sur, recordo y continuo que las congeladas relaciones intercoreanas acogieron el dramatico tiempo de deshielo con motivo de los Juegos Olimpicos y esto es de punta a cabo un merito del COI que ofrecio esa oportunidad y abrio las posibilidades.
					
					Kim Jong Un reitero el profundo agradecimiento por la cooperacion sincera, que ha brindado hasta la fecha el COI para la RPDC en cualesquier circunstancias y condiciones politicas, y deseo que se desarrollen continua y favorablemente las positivas y activas relaciones de cooperacion que existen entre el Comite Olimpico de la RPDC y el COI.
					
					Explicando al presidente del COI la politica deportiva de Corea y sus perspectivas, expreso la esperanza del estrecho contacto y buena cooperacion con el COI en desarrollar aun mas varias disciplinas deportivas, inclusive las invernales, conforme a la tendencia mundial.
					
					Curso la cordial invitacion a Thomas Bach deseando que el venga a menudo a Corea en calidad de amigo.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y del CC del PTC, Choe Hwi, presidente del Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes y vicepresidente del CC del PTC, Kim Il Guk, presidente del Comite Olimpico de la RPDC y ministro de Deportes, y otros cuadros.
					
					Este dia, el Maximo Dirigente presencio con la comitiva del presidente del COI el partido de futbol femenino entre la seleccion nacional y el equipo del Conjunto Deportivo de Pyongyang.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe regalo del Comite Olimpico Internacional
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe regalo del Comite Olimpico Internacional
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio un regalo que le obsequiara el Comite Olimpico Internacional (COI).
					El presidente del COI, Thomas Bach, quien realiza una visita a Corea al frente de la delegacion de su entidad, lo traslado el dia 30 a Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
